briefTitle: Abbreviated MRI Protocol: Initial Experience With Dotarem® (Gadoterate Meglumine)
officialTitle: Abbreviated MRI Protocol: Initial Experience With Dotarem® (Gadoterate Meglumine)
conditions: Breast Neoplasms, Breast Diseases, Breast Fibroadenoma, Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Compare the diagnostic accuracy of dynamic contrast-enhanced breast MRIs performed with an abbreviated protocol versus a full protocol
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Women between the ages of 18-80.
* Women with diagnostic imaging findings highly suspicious for breast cancer (BI-RADS category 4 or 5) or known breast cancer (BI-RADS category 6). Per BI-RADS lexicon, category 4 lesions carry a malignancy risk of 2-95% and category 5 lesions carry a malignancy risk of \>95%.

Exclusion Criteria:

* Women with a history of adverse reactions to contrast media.
* Women with GFR below 30 mL/min/1.73m².
